full_text: When I was an undergrad at @UMassAmherst I had the very great privilege of attending a seminar at @AmherstCollege where I heard Dr. Gerald Fink give a game-changing lecture on the importance of GMOs. (1/2)
@RagkousiK @AmherstCollege @the_Node @___SDB___ Thank you for having me!
@AmherstCollege No mask!
@AmherstCollege Can't be visitors from @BowdoinCollege - wrong color.
@AmherstCollege Just be glad it wasn't a Mammoth.

Looking forward to zooming into @ElProfeBarba's class today at @AmherstCollege on American Religious Traditions. Today we'll be discussing pieces from @smerconish and @RDispatches that explore the complex relationship between evangelicalism, conservatism, and American public life
@AmherstCollege @DailyHampGaz Maybe Amherst should stop giving platforms to rape culture-denying speakers like George Will and Bret Stephens.
@jeff12365848 @garyirelandesq @SydneyBIreland @AmherstCollege Also, maybe you would have more than zero followers if you treated the other half of the population the same as yours. Sad for you sir.

@jeff12365848 @garyirelandesq @SydneyBIreland @AmherstCollege Called the Scouts everywhere else on this earth. Only the US makes it a sexist club. Why? Girls can do everything that is done in scouting. Saying it is a BOYS only program means our daughters aren't treated fairly. Why shouldn't they have the bragging rights of an Eagle?
omg John Kasich is the worst please don't... see, @AmherstCollege, this is what happens when you host, pay, and legitimize a climate science-denying, anti-choice homophobe.
